column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////--The yeast-based desserts (like the croissants
column4: etc) now have an almost cheesy flavor. I'm not sure if this is because of the yeast or the butter used
column5: but it's different than before and can sometimes be quite strong. Also
column7: but it's a real shame that pistachio croissant is so artificially green since the filling tastes pretty good! When I brought one home to family
column8: most found the kelly green swirl a little freaky.
